  • Classes in buffalo3d.vos used by buffalo3d.animation 
    Class and Description
    Number3d
    Simple VO holding x,y, and z values.

    Class and Description
    Color4
    Simple struct/VO.
    Ray
    Represents a geometric ray, compound of a Number3d.
  • Classes in buffalo3d.vos used by buffalo3d.core 
    Class and Description
    CameraVo
    Encapsulates camera-related properties, including view frustrum.
    Color4
    Simple struct/VO.
    Color4Managed
    Same functionality as Color4, but uses proper accessors to r,g,b, and a properties, rather than VO-style public variables, so that 'dirty flag' can be managed properly.
    Face
    Simple VO with three properties representing vertex indicies.
    FogType 
    GLConfiguration 
    Light
    Light must be added to Scene to take effect.
    Number3d
    Simple VO holding x,y, and z values.
    Ray
    Represents a geometric ray, compound of a Number3d.
    RenderType 
    ShadeModel 
    TextureVo
    Contains the properties of a texture which can be assigned to an object.
    Uv
    Simple VO used for texture positioning
